title: Awesome List Updates on May 19, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 19, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Software / PaaS

*   [CapRover](https://caprover.com/) - Build your own PaaS in a few minutes. ([Demo](https://captain.server.demo.caprover.com/#/login), [Source Code (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/caprover/caprover)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/Nodejs`
*   [Coolify](https://coolify.io/) - An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify alternative (and even more). ([Source Code (‚≠ê43k)](https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker`
*   [Dokku](https://dokku.com/) - An open-source PaaS (alternative to Heroku). ([Source Code (‚≠ê31k)](https://github.com/dokku/dokku)) `MIT` `Docker/Shell/Go/deb`
*   [fx (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/metrue/fx) - A tool to help you do Function as a Service with painless on your own servers. `MIT` `Go`
*   [Kubero](https://www.kubero.dev/) - A self-hosted Heroku PaaS alternative for Kubernetes that implements GitOps. ([Demo](https://demo.kubero.dev/), [Source Code (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero)) `GPL-3.0` `K8S/Nodejs/Go`
*   [LocalStack](https://localstack.cloud/) - LocalStack is a fully functional local AWS cloud stack. This includes Lambda for serverless computation. ([Source Code (‚≠ê60k)](https://github.com/localstack/localstack)) `Apache-2.0` `Python/Docker/K8S`
*   [Nhost](https://nhost.io/) - Firebase Alternative with GraphQL. Get a database and backend configured and ready in minutes. ([Source Code (‚≠ê8.6k)](https://github.com/nhost/nhost)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs/Go`
*   [OpenFaaS](https://www.openfaas.com/) - Serverless Functions Made Simple for Docker & Kubernetes. ([Source Code (‚≠ê26k)](https://github.com/openfaas/faas)) `MIT` `Go`
*   [Tau](https://taubyte.com) - Easily build Cloud Computing Platforms with features like Serverless WebAssembly Functions, Frontend Hosting, CI/CD, Object Storage, K/V Database, and Pub-Sub Messaging. ([Source Code (‚≠ê4k)](https://github.com/taubyte/tau)) `BSD-3-Clause` `Go/Rust/Docker`
*   [Trusted-CGI (‚≠ê240)](https://github.com/reddec/trusted-cgi) - Lightweight self-hosted lambda/applications/cgi/serverless-functions platform. `MIT` `Go/deb/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / PaaS

  • CapRover - Build your own PaaS in a few minutes. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê14k)) Apache-2.0 Docker/Nodejs
  • Coolify - An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify alternative (and even more). (Source Code (‚≠ê43k)) Apache-2.0 Docker
  • Dokku - An open-source PaaS (alternative to Heroku). (Source Code (‚≠ê31k)) MIT Docker/Shell/Go/deb
  • fx (‚≠ê2.2k) - A tool to help you do Function as a Service with painless on your own servers. MIT Go
  • Kubero - A self-hosted Heroku PaaS alternative for Kubernetes that implements GitOps. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê3.6k)) GPL-3.0 K8S/Nodejs/Go
  • LocalStack - LocalStack is a fully functional local AWS cloud stack. This includes Lambda for serverless computation. (Source Code (‚≠ê60k)) Apache-2.0 Python/Docker/K8S
  • Nhost - Firebase Alternative with GraphQL. Get a database and backend configured and ready in minutes. (Source Code (‚≠ê8.6k)) MIT Docker/Nodejs/Go
  • OpenFaaS - Serverless Functions Made Simple for Docker & Kubernetes. (Source Code (‚≠ê26k)) MIT Go
  • Tau - Easily build Cloud Computing Platforms with features like Serverless WebAssembly Functions, Frontend Hosting, CI/CD, Object Storage, K/V Database, and Pub-Sub Messaging. (Source Code (‚≠ê4k)) BSD-3-Clause Go/Rust/Docker
  • Trusted-CGI (‚≠ê240) - Lightweight self-hosted lambda/applications/cgi/serverless-functions platform. MIT Go/deb/Docker

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Finance / Audio Record and Process

*   [SubManager](https://submanager.app) - Track your subscriptions in one place and get notified when a subscription is due for renewal. Available for macOS, iOS and visionOS and syncs across all your devices. [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/app/submanager-subscription-list/id1632853914)
items.content_html:
Finance / Audio Record and Process

  • SubManager - Track your subscriptions in one place and get notified when a subscription is due for renewal. Available for macOS, iOS and visionOS and syncs across all your devices.
